subject: p13896515
History: Year old man with CAD s/p CABG, AS s/p AVR, CHF, here for AMS and falls. Found to have left septic wrist. Course complicated by bacteremia on penicillin G. Had GIB requiring MICU stay. Now transferred to the floor with delirium. Now febrile, looking for infectious source. , Interval change.
Impression: Right PICC tip is in theright atrium. Moderate to severe cardiomegaly and widened mediastinum are unchanged. Sternal wires are aligned. Pacer leads are in standard position. There is no pneumothorax or large pleural effusions. Mild fluid overload is unchanged.
